Mouse.Label: Mouse
Mouse.Description: A device used to interact with a computer

StepOne.Label: Level Easy
StepOne.Description: The player must match pairs of appropriate pictures

StepTwo.Label: Level Medium
StepTwo.Description: It's about connecting a picture with a word that matches it

StepThree.Label: Level Hard
StepThree.Description: The player must match key words with an adequate definition
